version_description: Fixed a bug around loading deals
This release includes several bug fixes, as well as performance reliability updates.
Fixed a bug when saving deal custom fields
Fixed an issue preventing some users from viewing their Deals.
Fixed a navigation bug that interrupted contact viewing after leaving the app.

• Redesigned Tasks! We made finding and executing on your tasks even easier
• Quickly expand task to get more context
• Easily navigate to the related Deal or Contact
• Efficiently execute the task and move on to the next
Ability to sort tasks by Deal value
This release includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.

Account Management!
• Create new Accounts
• Add contacts to Accounts
• View and edit Account Notes

• Easily edit Deal stage from Deal detail view
Users can easily call their Accounts with a single tap.
This release includes several bug fixes and improvements.
This release includes several bug fixes and improvements.

• Selected pipeline and deal owner filters will now be persisted so you do not have to reset them every time you launch the app.
• Additional bug fixes and performance enhancements have been addressed.
